metadata.name: Magma Stone
metadata.description: The magma stone of the Firefall Mountains is a rare and coveted object in the fantasy world of Arvandor. It is said to have formed during the first eruption of the volcanoes that dot the landscape, when the earth was still young and the gods were still shaping its features. The stone is imbued with the power of the earth's molten core, and is capable of channeling and manipulating fire and lava. Many a brave adventurer has sought out the magma stone, hoping to harness its power for their own gain. However, the cave in which it resides is guarded by a fierce dragon, who will stop at nothing to protect the stone and the fiery secrets it holds.
